data.title: Charging Cord
data.body: The 4ft Mini USB SYNC Charging Cord Cable is a reliable replacement for Samsung HMX-F80, HMX-F90, HMX-F91, and HMX-F800 models, boasting CE / FCC / RoHS certifications and tested to meet or exceed OEM specifications with essential protections against overvoltage, overcurrent, and short circuits. Its brand-new, high-quality construction ensures durability and compatibility, making it an ideal solution for keeping your video camera powered and ready to capture moments without compromise.
